original_text: So Moses, the Lord's servant, died there in Moab. The Lord had said that this would happen.
korean_text: 이에 여호와의 종 모세가 여호와의 말씀대로 모압 땅에서 죽어

sentences.original_text: So Moses died there in Moab
The Lord had said that this would happen
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 이 일이 일어날 것이라고 말씀하셨다
